forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 60. East northeast wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely after 10pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 45, with temperatures rising to around 47 overnight. East wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely before 8am, then rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 71. Southeast wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and a chance of thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. Southwest wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
